sentences.en: A slightly mushy photograph can be easier to understand.
sentences.cn: 稍有模糊的照片更容易看懂.

sentences.en: Bread is thick, mushy, and sweet as hell.
sentences.cn: 面包又厚又软, 而且甜得要命.

sentences.en: By contrast " what can improve " is mushy and misleading.
sentences.cn: 相反, “ 可以改进的 ” 则是软弱无力且有误导性的词语.

sentences.en: Cook for two minutes until soft but not mushy.
sentences.cn: 煮两分钟，煮软但不要煮烂。

sentences.en: Cook the lentils until they are mushy.
sentences.cn: 把扁豆烧到呈烂糊状为止.

sentences.en: Cook until the fruit is soft but not mushy.
sentences.cn: 将水果煮至柔软，但不要煮成糊状。

sentences.en: Cut a watermelon 449, true thin - skinned fragile mushy watermelon pulp.
sentences.cn: 切一片西瓜四五两, 真正的薄皮脆沙瓤.

sentences.en: Don't go getting all mushy and sentimental.
sentences.cn: 不要变得过于多愁善感。

sentences.en: I hate those mushy love stories.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌那些伤感的爱情故事.

sentences.en: I sent him super mushy cards and stuffed animals on his birthdays.
sentences.cn: 在他生日的时候,我送给他超级浪漫卡片和动物玩具.

sentences.en: Love is more than just mushy feelings for an attractive face.
sentences.cn: 爱情不仅仅是建立在吸引人的外表上的朦胧的感觉.

sentences.en: The fish was mushy and tasteless.
sentences.cn: 鱼做得太烂了，没滋没味的。

sentences.en: This mushy spot explains the euphoria. Question is, what's causing the mush?
sentences.cn: 模糊解释了异常欣快问题是, 什么导致了区域模糊?

sentences.en: This mushy stuff is lousy. Do I have to eat it?
sentences.cn: 这种黑糊糊的东西真倒胃口. 我非要吃 吗 ?

sentences.en: We went to the chip shop and had the works : fish, chips, gherkins and mushy peas.
sentences.cn: 我们到薯条店去吃了套餐: 鱼 、 薯条 、 酸黃瓜还有豆泥.

sentences.en: When the fruit is mushy and cooked, remove from the heat.
sentences.cn: 当水果变软煮好后，就从火上端下来。

words.tran_cn: 感伤的话；浓粥；软块；胆怯
糊状的；感伤的，多愁善感的

trans.tran_cn: 糊状的，感情脆弱的，感伤的
